name: Out Of Space (itch) (Wubs)
description:
A casual roguelike arena "shooter" where you blast enemies off the arena sumo style. Unlock new weapons and abilities via the tech-tree, to level up your runs.

Current state
Out of space is in early access, and still actively being developed. There is currently 4 weapons, 1 powerup, and 2 biomes with unique enemies.

Plans:
We plan to involve the community during development and update the game often. As the content of the game is fleshed out, we will transition to Early Access on Steam.
Currently, we have about 30 weapons / items planned, as well as 5 biomes.
